target_name: Enhance global support for efforts to combat poaching and trafficking of protected species, including by increasing the capacity of local communities to pursue sustainable livelihood opportunities
computation_definitions:
Data unavailable (Type4)
There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
indicator_name: Proportion of traded wildlife that was poached or illicitly trafficked
indicator_definition: Traded wildlife found illegal as a proportion of all trade in wildlife, the sum of the values of legal and illegal trade.
global_indicator_name: Proportion of traded wildlife that was poached or illicitly trafficked
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
source_organisation_1: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
title: Untitled
graph_title: 불법 거래 혹은 밀렵된 야생생물 비율
